sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.OAuthGitHub</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>OAuthGitHub</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var OAuthGitHub = Class.create();
OAuthGitHub.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	interceptRequestParameters: function (requestParamMap) {},
	parseTokenResponse: function (accessTokenResponse) {},
	postProcessAccessToken: function (accessTokenResponse) {
		gs.log("Token received ---------------------------")
		var contentType = accessTokenResponse.getContentType();
		var contentBody  = accessTokenResponse.getBody();
		var paramMap = accessTokenResponse.getparameters();
		var params = contentBody.split('&');
		
		var parts, refreshToken = false;
		
		params.forEach(function (param){
			parts = param.split('=');
			if (parts && parts.length == 2){
				paramMap.put(parts[0], parts[1]);
				if (parts[0] == 'refresh_token')
					refreshToken = true;
			}
		});
		
		if (!refreshToken){
			paramMap.put('expires_in', '565246060');
		}
	},
    type: 'OAuthGitHub'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-03-04 00:59:25</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>2ed12f012f0a0110d8a4d5f62799b6e8</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>OAuthGitHub</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2ed12f012f0a0110d8a4d5f62799b6e8</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-04-08 18:38:21</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>913</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
